findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may expose the parties to liability without recourse, increasing risk in case of a breach or legal action.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The lack of audit rights limits oversight and accountability, potentially allowing breaches of confidentiality to go undetected.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The limitations on liability clauses may restrict recovery options in case of a breach, which poses a risk to the parties involved.
findings.evidence_quote: Limitation of liability shall not apply to indemnification, except as required by applicable law.
